about_the_game:
Farming just got a whole lot weirder!

Cyber pigs, mutated crops, and a lot of laughs — welcome to 🤖Cyber Farmer🤖, a wacky, post-apocalyptic farming simulator where tradition meets the future! Step into the boots of Kazimierz’s grandson, the next in line to inherit the family farm. Set in a world devastated by war, Cyber Farmer blends rustic village charm with outlandish cyber tech, all while cranking up the humor to the max.

Welcome to your post-apocalyptic farm☢️, where cyber tech🤖, genetically modified crops🌾, and cyber pigs🐷 are just part of everyday life. Prepare for a game full of laughs, bizarre surprises, and quirky farming fun as you build your very own cyber farm!

Key Features:

🤖 Use high-tech cyber gadgets to improve your farm: Harness the power of futuristic gadgets to take your farming to the next level. From robotic tools to cybernetic upgrades, tech is at the heart of your farming revolution.

😂 Hilarious gameplay with strange and funny moments: With tons of absurd moments, unexpected events, and quirky characters, Cyber Farmer is full of humor and fun. Expect plenty of laughs as you navigate through this bizarre farm life.

🌍 Post-apocalyptic world with humor and surprises: Discover a world torn apart by war, where the remnants of the old life mix with futuristic technology. Every corner hides bizarre surprises and quirky characters ready to keep you laughing.

🌱 Grow genetically modified crops and experiment with plant mutations: Explore a farming experience like no other! Modify your plants, experiment with strange mutations, and use cyber-enhancements to boost your crops to extraordinary levels.

🐷 Raise cyber pigs and other unusual animals: On this farm, animals aren’t just animals—they’re part of the future! Grow, modify, and raise cyber pigs and other mutated creatures to help you in your daily farming tasks.

🚜 Continue the farming legacy of Kazimierz’s grandson: As the heir to the family farm, you must keep the tradition alive, but with a twist! Combine the wisdom of the old farm with futuristic innovations to build the ultimate cyber farm.

Farm the future, laugh through the past!

name: Cyber Farmer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 750
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Cyber Farmer is a crazy farming simulator where old meets new! Take over your grandpa Kazimierz's farm in a post-apocalyptic world☢️, using cyber tech🤖, modified plants🌾, and even cyber pigs🐷. It’s full of laughs, weird surprises, and quirky farming fun. Farm the future, laugh through the past!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
